config.description: Cloud Cost YTD Overview Dashboard for the FinOps Executive/Leadership persona
Multi cloud spend details on Marketplace and Operating System Licenses
Multi cloud spend details grouped by Service to support the FinOps Business/Product persona
Multi cloud spend details of individual resources to support the FinOps Engineering / Operations persona
Cloud Cost Summary for the FinOps Executive/Leadership persona
Cloud Cost Overview of Actual and Amortized cost details for the FinOps Finance & Procurement personas
Cloud spend on Reservations, On Demand and Spot and summary of savings
Reservation details including Unused Commitments and Realized Savings from Commitments
